articles.title: The Massive Galaxy Z TriFold Is Turning Heads at CES. It's Easy to See Why - PCMag
articles.description: This phone takes the basic idea of the Z Fold 7 and makes it 50% bigger by adding a third display panel. It's outrageous, and we got a first look here at CES.

articles.description: Newly-developed six-cylinder twin-turbo engine replaces retired EJ20 as Subaru aims for first GT300 title since 2021...

articles.title: AI Faces Fool Most of Us, But 5 Minutes of Training May Help You Spot Fakes - ScienceAlert
articles.description: AI image generators have become remarkably proficient in a very short period, capable of creating faces that are considered to be more realistic than the real thing.
